-e ---

𐍂 ⋍ RK/KR
Looks something between an R and a K AND acts something between an R and a K :

𐍅𐌰𐌿𐍂𐍃𐍄𐍅 workst = Werk/work/Wackersdo
𐌳𐌰𐌿𐍂𐌹 Track (street)

Interstingly the W-R-K component can be saught in three substings of the word 𐍅𐌰𐌿𐍂𐍃𐍄𐍅

𐍅𐌰𐌿 Work
𐍅𐌰𐌿𐍂 worK
𐍅𐌰𐌿𐍂𐍃 Waurgs/Waurrkgs:Wa.ar.rh.rk.gs

𐌹𐌲𐌵𐌰𐍂 ιgcar eugqhar Euch Euer ěr:尔 you two (dual -ér 儿)
